name: pockmarked
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
marked with pockmarks: a pockmarked face
A pockmarked surface has a lot of holes or low areas in it: The old barn was pockmarked with bullet holes.

having small hollows on the skin, esp. on the face: a pockmarked face
A surface that is pockmarked has a lot of hollows in it: a pockmarked wall
